title: Linda's film on menstruation
creator_credit: Linda Feferman, Georghe Eichen and Phoenix Films
brief_description: Humorous film designed to explode the myths surrounding menstruation and inform on the facts. Includes an animated segment explaining the physiological process of menstruation.
